Topics in Economics
  • Taught twice (2022, 2023)
  • Bachelor of Science, Ecole Polytechnique
  • 14 classes of 2 hours

This class has two parts. First an introduction to econometrics, with hands-on TDs on Stata. Second an introduction to economic modeling using some of Gary Becker's models.
